original_text: and did not inquire of the Lord. So the Lord put him to death and turned the kingdom over to David son of Jesse.
korean_text: 여호와께 묻지 아니하였으므로 여호와께서 그를 죽이시고 그 나라를 이새의 아들 다윗에게 넘겨 주셨더라

sentences.original_text: and did not inquire of the Lord.
So the Lord put him to death
and turned the kingdom over to David
